ground_truth: Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching. A woman rises on tip-toes and kisses a man gently; he only looks at her. She kisses him again, and he responds a little better. As she starts to kiss him again, he stops her. The man hangs up the phone, swings his feet out of bed, spears his slippers, and reaches for his robe at the same time. He shuffles sleepily to the door as Gideon exits his room and goes to the elevator. The cage is there; he opens the door, enters, closes the sliding grill, and presses a button. The cage starts down, but Gideon begins sneezing. Suddenly, the elevator stops between floors and the lights go out, then just as suddenly, the lights come back on and the elevator resumes moving down. Gideon shakes his head and leans back, whistling again until the cage comes to his floor and starts past it, leaving him confused. The night porter, asleep behind the desk, does not notice as the elevator continues past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight. Silence follows as the motor stops, then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. Rudely awakened, the night porter runs to the elevator shaft as his shoes squeak. He looks up, sees nothing, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor starts. An instant later, the cage appears and stops; the night porter opens the gate, pulls back the grill, and the camera rushes past him to pick up Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cage in a grotesque, sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut, except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot, Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange looks before Grandpierre turns and leaves. Reggie and Adam start down the hall toward their rooms. Before hanging up, Adam reflects on Tex's words, then looks behind him, smiles softly, hangs up the phone, and heads for Reggie's door. Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door, undoes the bolt, and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a bag to the bed, dumps out the contents, and begins examining the items one by one, taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it. He hands her the glasses, and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Everybody at the table stands collectively at the rail observing. A lady rises on tip-toes and kisses a gentleman softly; he merely gazes at her. She kisses him again, and he reacts a bit more favorably. As she begins to kiss him once more, he halts her. The gentleman hangs up the telephone, swings his feet out of bed, spears his slippers, and reaches for his robe simultaneously. He shuffles drowsily to the door as Gideon exits his chamber and proceeds to the lift. The cage is present; he opens the door, enters, closes the sliding grill, and presses a button. The cage begins descending, but Gideon begins sneezing. Suddenly, the lift halts between floors and the lights extinguish, then just as abruptly, the lights return and the lift resumes descending. Gideon shakes his head and reclines, whistling once more until the cage arrives at his level and starts passing it, leaving him bewildered. The night porter, asleep behind the desk, does not perceive as the lift continues past the lobby level toward the cellar and out of view. Quietness follows as the motor ceases, then a series of sneezes culminates with a terrifying scream. Rudely roused, the night porter sprints to the lift shaft as his shoes squeak. He gazes upward, perceives nothing, then glances downward, presses the call button, and the motor initiates. An instant later, the cage materializes and halts; the night porter opens the gate, pulls back the grill, and the camera rushes past him to capture Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cage in a monstrous, sprawling position resembling a puppet with its strings severed, except Gideon has no strings to sever—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot, Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera retreats to disclose Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange glances before Grandpierre turns and departs. Reggie and Adam commence down the corridor toward their chambers. Before hanging up, Adam contemplates Tex's phrases, then looks behind him, smiles softly, hangs up the telephone, and heads for Reggie's door. Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door, undoes the bolt, and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a sack to the bed, dumps out the contents, and begins scrutinizing the items one by one, taking one out of an envelope before putting on his spectacles to read it. He hands her the spectacles, and she peers through them.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table is stood together at the rail by them, watching. A kiss is gently given to a man by a woman as she rises on tip-toes; he only looks at her. He is kissed again by her, and he responds a little better. As another kiss is started by her, he stops her. The phone is hung up by the man, his feet are swung out of bed, his slippers are speared, and his robe is reached for at the same time. The door is shuffled to sleepily by him as Gideon exits his room and goes to the elevator. The door is opened, entered, closed with the sliding grill by him, and a button is pressed. The cage is started down, but sneezes are begun by Gideon. Suddenly, the elevator stops between floors and the lights go out, then just as suddenly, the lights come back on and the elevator resumes moving down. The head is shaken by Gideon, and he leans back, whistling again until his floor is passed by the cage, leaving him confused. The elevator's passing past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight is not noticed by the night porter, asleep behind the desk. Silence follows as the motor stops, then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. The night porter is rudely awakened, and he runs to the elevator shaft as his shoes squeak. He looks up, sees nothing, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor starts. The cage appears and stops an instant later; the gate is opened by the night porter, the grill is pulled back, and the camera rushes past him to pick up Gideon. The floor of the cage is occupied by Gideon's body in a grotesque, sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut, except there are no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot, Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. A shrug is given by Reggie, and looks are exchanged by her and Adam before Grandpierre turns and leaves. The hall is started down by Reggie and Adam toward their rooms. Before he hangs up, Tex's words are reflected on by Adam, then he looks behind him, smiles softly, hangs up the phone, and heads for Reggie's door. Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door, undoes the bolt, and opens it for Adam to enter. A bag is taken to the bed by him, its contents are dumped out, and the items are begun to be examined one by one, with one being taken out of an envelope before his glasses are put on by him to read it. The glasses are handed to her by him, and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands at the rail watching. A woman kisses a man gently; he only looks at her. She kisses him again, and he responds better, but stops her next attempt. The man hangs up the phone, swings his feet out of bed, puts on his slippers, and grabs his robe. He shuffles to the door as Gideon exits and heads to the elevator. Opening the door, Gideon enters the cage, closes the grill, and presses a button. The elevator descends, but Gideon sneezes. Suddenly, it stops between floors and the lights go out, then resume as it continues down. Gideon is confused when it passes his floor. The night porter, asleep behind the desk, misses the elevator passing the lobby toward the basement. Silence follows the motor stopping, then sneezes end with a shriek. The night porter, awakened, runs to the shaft, presses the call button, and the motor starts. The cage reappears; he opens the gate, the camera finds Gideon's body sprawled on the floor, throat cut ear to ear. Grandpierre looks apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in bathrobes. Reggie shrugs, exchanging looks with Adam before Grandpierre leaves. Reggie and Adam head down the hall. Adam reflects on Tex's words, smiles, hangs up the phone, and goes to Reggie's door. Reggie, now in her robe, opens the connecting door for Adam. He dumps out a bag's contents on the bed and examines them, reading one item with glasses. He hands her the glasses, and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table watches. A woman rises to kiss a man, who initially doesn't respond but then reciprocates slightly. He stops her before she can kiss him again. The man hangs up the phone, gets out of bed, puts on his slippers and robe, and shuffles to the door. Gideon exits his room, enters the elevator, which starts down but stops suddenly as he sneezes. The lights go out, then back on, and the elevator moves past his floor, leaving him bewildered. The night porter, asleep, doesn’t notice as it continues past the lobby. Awoken by sneezes and a shriek, he runs, presses the call button, and the elevator appears. He opens the gate, revealing Gideon's body sprawled grotesquely on the floor with a cut throat. Grandpierre appears shocked as the camera shows Reggie and Adam in bathrobes. Reggie shrugs; she and Adam exchange looks before going to their rooms. Adam thinks about Tex's words, then smiles and heads to Reggie's door. Reggie, in her robe, opens the connecting door for Adam, who dumps a bag on the bed and examines its contents, handing her glasses to look through.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
At the table, everyone stands together, united in their gaze as they watch intently from the rail. A woman, full of grace and affection, rises up on her tip-toes to plant a gentle, loving kiss on a man; he responds only by looking at her. She leans in to kiss him once more, and this time, he responds slightly more satisfactorily. As she moves to kiss him again, with increasing fondness, he abruptly stops her.

Meanwhile, the man hangs up the telephone, swings his feet out of the warm bed, slips into his comfortable slippers, and simultaneously reaches for his robe. He shuffles, still drowsy, towards the door just as Gideon emerges from his room, making his way to the elevator. The elevator cage awaits; he opens the door, steps inside, and pulls the sliding grill closed before pressing a button. The cage begins its descent, but then Gideon starts to sneeze continuously. Suddenly, the elevator jerks to a stop between floors, and the lights flicker out, engulfing him in darkness—just as quickly, however, the lights flicker back on and the elevator resumes its downward motion. Feeling perplexed, Gideon shakes his head and leans back, whistling once again until the cage finally reaches his intended floor and unexpectedly continues past it, leaving him in confusion.

In the lobby, the night porter is fast asleep behind the desk, oblivious as the elevator glides past the lobby level down toward the basement and disappears from sight. Silence settles in as the motor comes to a stop, then suddenly, a series of sneezes culminates in a terrifying, blood-curdling shriek. Jolted awake, the night porter dashes to the elevator shaft, his shoes squeaking loudly. He looks upward, seeing nothing, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor hums to life. In an instant, the elevator cage returns to view and stops; the night porter opens the gate, slides back the grill, and the camera dramatically sweeps past him to reveal Gideon. There, on the floor of the cage, Gideon's lifeless body sits in a grotesque, sprawling position like a marionette with its strings severed—only, Gideon's strings aren't the ones cut; it is his throat, slashed from ear to ear.

In a close-up shot, Grandpierre appears visibly agitated, nearly apoplectic, as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam standing nearby in their bathrobes. Reggie gives a small shrug, and she and Adam exchange meaningful looks before Grandpierre turns on his heel and departs. Reggie and Adam then start down the hallway toward their respective rooms. Before hanging up, Adam pauses to reflect on Tex's words, then gazes over his shoulder. A soft smile graces his lips as he hangs up the phone and goes to Reggie's door. Meanwhile, Reggie slips back into her robe and moves to the connecting door, unbolting and opening it to allow Adam inside. He takes a bag to the bed, upends it to spill out its contents, and methodically begins examining each item, removing one from an envelope before donning his glasses to read it carefully. Handing her the glasses, she peers through them with interest.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
At the table, everyone, a harmonious group of individuals, stands together as one, united in their shared gaze as their eyes watch intently from the rail. A woman, embodying grace and affection to the fullest, rises up on her tip-toes to plant a gentle, loving kiss on a man; he, however, responds only by looking at her without much emotion. She leans in to kiss him once more, and this time, he responds slightly more satisfactorily, but still not with the enthusiasm she might have hoped for. As she moves to kiss him again, with ever-increasing fondness and warmth, he abruptly stops her, putting an end to the moment.

Meanwhile, the man is engaged in the act of hanging up the telephone, swinging his feet out of the warm and comfortable bed. He slips into his cozy slippers and simultaneously reaches for his robe. He shuffles, still somewhat drowsy, towards the door just as Gideon makes his own appearance, emerging from his room, and heads to the elevator. The elevator cage awaits him; he opens the door, steps inside, and pulls the sliding grill closed before pressing a button. The cage begins its descent, yet Gideon suddenly starts to sneeze continuously. Suddenly, the elevator jerks to a stop between floors, and the lights flicker out, plunging him into darkness—just as quickly, however, the lights flicker back on and the elevator resumes its downward motion. Feeling perplexed by the unexpected events, Gideon shakes his head to clear his thoughts and leans back, whistling once again until the cage finally reaches his intended floor and unexpectedly continues past it, leaving him in a state of confusion.

In the lobby, the night porter is fast asleep behind the desk, completely oblivious as the elevator glides past the lobby level down toward the basement, disappearing from sight. Silence settles in as the motor comes to a stop, only to be shattered by a sudden series of sneezes that culminates in a terrifying, blood-curdling shriek. Jolted awake, the night porter dashes to the elevator shaft, his shoes squeaking loudly on the floor. He looks upward, seeing nothing, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor hums back to life. In an instant, the elevator cage returns to view and comes to a stop; the night porter quickly opens the gate, slides back the grill, and the camera dramatically sweeps past him to reveal Gideon. There, on the floor of the cage, Gideon's lifeless body sits in a grotesque, sprawling position, akin to a marionette with its strings severed—only, in this gruesome scene, it is not Gideon's strings that are cut but rather his throat, slashed viciously from ear to ear.

In a close-up shot, Grandpierre appears visibly agitated, nearly apoplectic with emotion, as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam standing nearby in their bathrobes. Reggie gives a small shrug, and she and Adam exchange meaningful looks before Grandpierre turns on his heel and departs, leaving them behind. Reggie and Adam then start down the hallway, moving toward their respective rooms. Before hanging up, Adam pauses to reflect on Tex's words, then gazes over his shoulder thoughtfully. A soft smile graces his lips as he finally hangs up the phone and makes his way to Reggie's door. Meanwhile, Reggie slips back into her robe and moves to the connecting door, unbolting and opening it to allow Adam entrance inside. He takes a bag to the bed, upends it to spill out its contents, and methodically begins examining each item, carefully removing one from an envelope before donning his glasses to read it with focus and attention. Handing her the glasses, she peers through them with keen interest.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As everyone at the table rises together, they stand at the rail, their eyes fixed on the scene before them in anticipation. A woman, lifting herself on her tip-toes for better reach, leans towards a man and plants a gentle kiss on his lips. He remains passive, simply looking at her without any reaction. Unperturbed, she leans in once more and kisses him again; this time, he responds slightly more, adding a hint of acknowledgment. As she moves in for yet another kiss, he gently stops her, indicating a pause in their quiet exchange. Meanwhile, in a different setting, a man concludes his phone conversation by hanging up and swinging his feet from the comfort of his bed. He reaches out to slip his feet into his waiting slippers and simultaneously extends his arm to grab his robe, readying himself for the next steps of his day. Moving sluggishly, he shuffles towards the door, his movements still carrying the weight of sleep. At this moment, Gideon exits his room and strides towards the elevator. Approaching the cage, he opens the door, steps inside, and closes the sliding grill behind him before pressing the designated button to descend. As the elevator begins its downward journey, Gideon starts sneezing abruptly. Suddenly, the elevator halts between floors, plunging into darkness as the lights flicker out. Then, just as suddenly, the lights flicker back on, and the elevator resumes its descent. Gideon shakes his head, trying to clear it, and leans back, producing a whistle to fill the silence until the cage surpasses his intended floor, leaving him baffled. Meanwhile, the night porter, immersed in slumber behind the desk, fails to notice the elevator bypassing the lobby and continuing its descent toward the basement, drifting out of sight. Silence envelops the scene as the motor ceases, only for the silence to be broken by a succession of sneezes that culminate in a horrifying shriek. Jolted from his sleep, the night porter dashes to the elevator shaft, his shoes squeaking with urgency. He glances upward, seeing nothing before shifting his gaze downward, pressing the call button out of reflex. The motor kicks back into action, and within moments, the cage reappears and comes to a halt. The night porter quickly opens the gate, slides back the grill, and the camera rushes past him to capture the chilling sight of Gideon. Gideon's body rests unnaturally on the cage floor in a grotesque sprawl reminiscent of a puppet abandoned by its puppeteer, except Gideon has no strings—only a throat slashed from ear to ear. In a tight shot, Grandpierre's face displays a mix of fury and bewilderment as the camera draws back, revealing Reggie and Adam standing in their bathrobes. Reggie merely shrugs, exchanging a look with Adam, as Grandpierre pivots on his heel and departs. Together, Reggie and Adam make their way down the hall toward their respective rooms. Before ending his phone conversation, Adam pauses to contemplate Tex’s words, then glances over his shoulder, allowing a soft smile to form. Satisfied, he hangs up the phone and proceeds to Reggie’s door. Meanwhile, Reggie slips back into her robe, approaches the connecting door, and undoes the bolt, swinging it open to invite Adam inside. Adam carries a bag to the bed, tipping it over to release its contents, which spill out in a casual heap. He begins to scrutinize the items one by one, taking one from an envelope and pausing to put on his glasses for a closer inspection. He then hands the glasses to Reggie, who takes them and peers through to examine the object herself.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands at the rail, watching. A woman kisses a man, who initially does not respond but gradually reciprocates until he stops her. A man finishes a phone call, gets out of bed, and puts on his robe and slippers. He sleepily heads to the door, where Gideon exits his room and takes the elevator. The elevator malfunctions, stopping between floors and briefly losing power before resuming its descent. Gideon, confused as it passes his floor, whistling as it heads to the basement, sneezes multiple times, ending with a shriek. The noise wakes the night porter who rushes to the elevator shaft, sees nothing, and presses the call button. The elevator returns, revealing Gideon's lifeless body with a cut throat. The camera captures Grandpierre's shock, then shifts to Reggie and Adam in bathrobes exchanging looks before Grandpierre leaves. Reggie and Adam head to their rooms, with Adam reflecting on Tex's words before joining Reggie. She unlocks the connecting door, and Adam enters with a bag, examining its contents and sharing his glasses with her for a closer look.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description:
Everyone at the table, gathered in the elegant dining room on the ship known for its grand ocean voyages, stands together at the rail watching the waves gently lap against the vessel. A woman, dressed in a vintage gown reminiscent of the roaring twenties, rises on tip-toes and kisses a man gently; he only looks at her, his eyes reflecting the moonlit sea. She kisses him again, and he responds a little better, his weariness momentarily forgotten. As she starts to kiss him once more, he stops her, glancing back at the horizon where the lighthouse beam intermittently punctuates the night.

The man hangs up the phone, an old rotary model that clicks with each number dialed, swings his feet out of bed, spears his slippers with precision, and reaches for his robe, a worn, comfortable garment he’s had for years, at the same time. He shuffles sleepily to the door, the patterned carpet muffling his steps, as Gideon, known amongst friends for his punctuality, exits his room and goes to the elevator. The cage, an antique lift with wrought iron details that has seen countless guests, is there; he opens the door, enters, closes the sliding grill, and presses a button. The cage starts down with a gentle whir, but Gideon begins sneezing, a reaction triggered by the dust that sometimes accumulates in the old shaft. Suddenly, the elevator stops between floors, and the lights flicker ominously out, then just as suddenly, they return, and the elevator resumes its descent. Gideon shakes his head, a bit dazed, and leans back, whistling again to calm himself until the cage unexpectedly continues past his floor, leaving him confused.

The night porter, asleep behind the desk with the latest issue of his favorite detective novel resting on his chest, does not notice as the elevator continues past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight. Silence follows as the motor stops, then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek that echoes through the hall. Rudely awakened, the night porter runs to the elevator shaft, where his shoes squeak on the polished marble floor. He looks up, sees nothing but shadows, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor starts again. An instant later, the cage appears and stops; the night porter opens the gate, with his heart pounding in his chest, pulls back the grill, and the camera, as if in a suspenseful film, rushes past him to capture Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cage in a grotesque, sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut, except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear, a chilling reminder of the unsolved mysteries that haunt the ship.

In a close shot, Grandpierre, the ship's stern head of security known for his sharp instincts, appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes, their faces a mix of shock and curiosity. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange looks, silent yet understanding, before Grandpierre turns and leaves, his mind already racing through a list of suspects. Reggie and Adam start down the hall toward their rooms, the dim lights casting long shadows as they walk. Before hanging up, Adam reflects on Tex's words, the cryptic message lingering in his thoughts, then looks behind him, smiles softly at the absurdity of it all, hangs up the phone, and heads for Reggie's door.

Reggie slips back into her robe, her designer silk garment offering little warmth against the chill of recent events, and goes to the connecting door, undoes the bolt, and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a bag to the bed, dumps out the contents, revealing an assortment of items hinting at their ongoing investigation, and begins examining them one by one, taking a document out of an envelope before putting on his glasses, his trusty reading lenses that have aided him through many late-night mysteries, to read it. He hands her the glasses, and she looks through them, her curiosity piqued by the discovery of a clue that might unravel the night's dark events.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Silence follows as the motor stops. then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. Rudely awakened the night porter runs to the elevator shaft as his shoes squeak. He looks up sees nothing then looks down presses the call button and the motor starts. An instant later the cage appears and stops. the night porter opens the gate pulls back the grill and the camera rushes past him to pick up Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cage in a grotesque sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs and she and Adam exchange looks before Grandpierre turns and leaves. Reggie and Adam start down the hall toward their rooms. He takes a bag to the bed dumps out the contents and begins examining the items one by one taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it. He hands her the glasses and she looks through them.

test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching. A woman rises on tiptoes and kisses a man gently. he only looks at her. She kisses him again and he responds a little better. As she starts to kiss him again he stops her. The man hangs up the phone swings his feet out of bed spears his slippers and reaches for his robe at the same time. He shuffles sleepily to the door as Gideon exits his room and goes to the elevator. The cage is there. he opens the door enters closes the sliding grill and presses a button. The cage starts down but Gideon begins sneezing. Suddenly the elevator stops between floors and the lights go out. then just as suddenly the lights come back on and the elevator resumes moving down. Gideon shakes his head and leans back whistling again until the cage comes to his floor and starts past it leaving him confused. The night porter asleep behind the desk does not notice as the elevator continues past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. Silence follows as the motor stops. then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. Rudely awakened the night porter runs to the elevator shaft as his shoes squeak. He looks up sees nothing then looks down presses the call button and the motor starts. An instant later the cage appears and stops. the night porter opens the gate pulls back the grill and the camera rushes past him to pick up Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cage in a grotesque sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs and she and Adam exchange looks before Grandpierre turns and leaves. Reggie and Adam start down the hall toward their rooms. Before hanging up Adam reflects on Tex's words then looks behind him smiles softly hangs up the phone and heads for Reggie's door. Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door undo. es the bolt and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a bag to the bed dumps out the contents and begins examining the items one by one taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it. He hands her the glasses and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching. A woman rises on tiptoes and kisses a man gently. he only looks at her. She kisses him again and he responds a little better. As she starts to kiss him again he stops her. The man hangs up the phone swings his feet out of bed spears his slippers and reaches for his robe at the same time. He shuffles sleepily to the door as Gideon exits his room and goes to the elevator. In a close shot Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs and she and Adam exchange looks before Grandpierre turns and leaves. Reggie and Adam start down the hall toward their rooms. Before hanging up Adam reflects on Tex's words then looks behind him smiles softly hangs up the phone and heads for Reggie's door. Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door undo. es the bolt and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a bag to the bed dumps out the contents and begins examining the items one by one taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it. He hands her the glasses and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching. A woman rises on tiptoes and kisses a man gently. he only looks at her. es the bolt and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a bag to the bed dumps out the contents and begins examining the items one by one taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it. He hands her the glasses and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching. A dog rises on tip-toes and kisses a tree gently; it only looks at the dog. The dog kisses the tree again, and it responds a little better. As the dog starts to kiss the tree again, it stops the dog. The fish hangs up the phone, swings its feet out of bed, spears its slippers, and reaches for its robe at the same time. It shuffles sleepily to the door as a parrot exits its room and goes to the elevator. The unicorn is there; it opens the door, enters, closes the sliding grill, and presses a button. The unicorn starts down, but the parrot begins sneezing. Suddenly, the elevator stops between floors and the lights go out, then just as suddenly, the lights come back on and the elevator resumes moving down. The parrot shakes its head and leans back, whistling again until the unicorn comes to its floor and starts past it, leaving the parrot confused. The cat, asleep behind the desk, does not notice as the elevator continues past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight. Silence follows as the motor stops, then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. Rudely awakened, the cat runs to the elevator shaft as its shoes squeak. It looks up, sees nothing, then looks down, presses the call button, and the motor starts. An instant later, the unicorn appears and stops; the cat opens the gate, pulls back the grill, and the camera rushes past it to pick up the parrot. The parrot's body sits on the floor of the unicorn in a grotesque, sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut, except the parrot has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot, a hamster appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal a rabbit and a fox in their bathrobes. The rabbit shrugs, and it and the fox exchange looks before the hamster turns and leaves. The rabbit and the fox start down the hall toward their rooms. Before hanging up, the fox reflects on a dog's words, then looks behind it, smiles softly, hangs up the phone, and heads for the rabbit's door. The rabbit slips back into its robe and goes to the connecting door, undoes the bolt, and opens it for the fox to enter. The fox takes a bag to the bed, dumps out the contents, and begins examining the items one by one, taking one out of an envelope before putting on its glasses to read it. It hands the rabbit the glasses, and the rabbit looks through them.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table stands together at the fence watching. A woman rises on tip-toes and kisses a man gently; he only looks at her. She kisses him again, and he responds a little better. As she starts to kiss him again, he stops her. The man hangs up the remote, swings his feet out of the hammock, spears his sandals, and reaches for his jacket at the same time. He shuffles sleepily to the window as Gideon exits his nook and goes to the escalator. The cart is there; he opens the door, enters, closes the sliding panel, and presses a switch. The cart starts down, but Gideon begins sneezing. Suddenly, the escalator stops between levels and the lights go out, then just as suddenly, the lights come back on and the escalator resumes moving down. Gideon shakes his head and leans back, whistling again until the cart comes to his level and starts past it, leaving him confused. The night guard, asleep behind the counter, does not notice as the escalator continues past the atrium level toward the garage and out of sight. Silence follows as the engine stops, then a series of sneezes ends with a terrifying shriek. Rudely awakened, the night guard runs to the escalator shaft as his boots squeak. He looks up, sees nothing, then looks down, presses the call switch, and the engine starts. An instant later, the cart appears and stops; the night guard opens the hatch, pulls back the panel, and the camera rushes past him to pick up Gideon. Gideon's body sits on the floor of the cart in a grotesque, sprawling attitude resembling a puppet with its strings cut, except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a throat cut from ear to ear. In a close shot, Grandpierre appears doubly apoplectic as the camera pulls back to reveal Reggie and Adam in their snowsuits. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange looks before Grandpierre turns and leaves. Reggie and Adam start down the corridor toward their cubicles. Before hanging up, Adam reflects on Tex's words, then looks behind him, smiles softly, hangs up the remote, and heads for Reggie's cubicle. Reggie slips back into her snowsuit and goes to the adjoining hatch, undoes the latch, and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a basket to the couch, dumps out the contents, and begins examining the items one by one, taking one out of a dossier before putting on his goggles to read it. He hands her the goggles, and she looks through them.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Everyone at the table jumps together at the rail laughing. A woman crouches on tip-toes and waves to a man gently; he only nods at her. She waves at him again, and he gestures a little better. As she starts to wave again, he interrupts her. The man picks up the phone, rolls his feet out of bed, pokes his slippers, and reaches for his robe at the same time. He hops sleepily to the door as Gideon enters his room and dances to the elevator. The cage is there; he slides the door, enters, closes the sliding grill, and turns a knob. The cage starts up, but Gideon begins hiccupping. Suddenly, the elevator halts between floors and the music plays, then just as suddenly, the music stops and the elevator resumes floating up. Gideon nods his head and leans forward, humming again until the cage comes to his floor and floats past it, leaving him puzzled. The night porter, dozing behind the desk, does not notice as the elevator drifts past the lobby level toward the attic and out of sight. Silence follows as the motor pauses, then a series of hiccups ends with a terrifying chuckle. Rudely awakened, the night porter strolls to the elevator shaft as his shoes echo. He gazes up, sees nothing, then peers down, turns the call knob, and the motor spins. An instant later, the cage descends and halts; the night porter slams the gate, pulls back the grill, and the camera wanders past him to spot Gideon. Gideon's body sprawls on the floor of the cage in a grotesque, lounging attitude resembling a marionette with its strings tangled, except Gideon has no strings to tangle—only a throat covered with a scarf. In a close shot, Grandpierre appears doubly perplexed as the camera pulls away to reveal Reggie and Adam in their bathrobes. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange nods before Grandpierre turns and whispers. Reggie and Adam glide down the hall toward their rooms. Before picking up, Adam reflects on Tex's songs, then gazes behind him, laughs softly, picks up the phone, and strolls to Reggie's door. Reggie slides back into her robe and tiptoes to the connecting door, secures the bolt, and swings it for Adam to enter. He drags a bag to the bed, spills out the contents, and begins inspecting the items one by one, lifting one from an envelope before removing his glasses to smell it. He tosses her the glasses, and she peers through them.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: All the zebras in the helicopter stand together at the hammock observing. An ostrich rises on claw-tips and kisses a dolphin gently; it only looks at the penguin. The ostrich kisses the dolphin again, and it responds a little better. As the ostrich starts to kiss the dolphin again, it stops the ostrich. The dolphin hangs up the book, swings its whiskers out of the basket, spears its goggles, and reaches for its helmet at the same time. It waddles sleepily to the window as Marmaduke exits its igloo and goes to the escalator. The suitcase is there; the koala opens the window, enters, closes the sliding fence, and presses a pedal. The suitcase starts down, but Marmaduke begins hiccuping. Suddenly, the escalator stops between gardens and the candles go out, then just as suddenly, the candles come back on and the escalator resumes descending. Marmaduke shakes its toes and leans back, humming again until the suitcase comes to its field and starts past it, leaving it confused. The morning rooster, asleep behind the couch, does not notice as the escalator continues past the playground level toward the aquarium and out of sight. Stillness follows as the gramophone stops, then a series of hiccups ends with a terrifying roar. Rudely awakened, the morning rooster runs to the escalator chimney as its sandals squeak. It looks over, sees nothing, then looks under, presses the call pedal, and the gramophone starts. An instant later, the suitcase appears and stops; the morning rooster opens the hatch, pulls back the fence, and the lens rushes past it to pick up Marmaduke. Marmaduke's kite sits on the floor of the suitcase in a grotesque, sprawling formation resembling a marionette with its ropes cut, except Marmaduke has no ropes to cut—only a crown sliced from tusk to tusk. In a close shot, Barnabas appears doubly ecstatic as the lens pulls back to reveal Veronica and Ethan in their nightcaps. Veronica shrugs, and she and Ethan exchange glances before Barnabas turns and wanders. Veronica and Ethan start down the lake toward their cabins. Before dropping the receiver, Ethan muses on Jerry's rhymes, then looks aside, smirks gently, drops the receiver, and heads for Veronica's hatch. Veronica slips back into her mitten and goes to the revolving hatch, undoes the latch, and opens it for Ethan to enter. He takes a suitcase to the hammock, dumps out the greenery, and begins scrutinizing the textures one by one, taking one out of an envelope before putting on his monocle to interpret it. He hands her the monocle, and she peers through it.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Several robots at the window assemble silently at the fence observing. An octopus ascends on a skateboard and pets a cat gently; it only listens to her. She pets it again, and it rejoices a little louder. As she tries to pet it again, it evades her. The octopus drops the pen, rolls its wheels off of the trampoline, flings its mittens, and reaches for its hat at the same time. It whirls dizzily to the porch as Nathaniel vanishes from his chamber and wanders to the ferris wheel. The trunk is there; it pushes the door, enters, closes the sliding curtain, and whistles a jingle. The trunk begins ascending, but Nathaniel starts giggling. Abruptly, the ferris wheel halts beneath the sky and the shadows vanish, only to suddenly reappear as the wheel continues spinning up. Nathaniel spins his feet and slides back, meowing again until the trunk rises to his level and glides past it, leaving him puzzled. The evening baker, napping beneath the chair, does not detect as the ferris wheel glides beyond the rooftop level toward the heavens and disappears. Calmness ensues as the engine silences, then a collection of giggles concludes with a monstrous bang. Abruptly startled, the evening baker gallops to the trunk path as his slippers squeak. He gazes up, notices nothing, then glances down, pushes the off button, and the engine whirs. A moment later, the trunk materializes and halts; the evening baker pushes the latch, pulls back the curtain, and the telescope swings past him to locate Nathaniel. Nathaniel's figure stands on the ceiling of the trunk in an awkward, bending posture resembling a doll with its hinges removed, except Nathaniel has no hinges to remove—only a scarf tied from crown to chin. In a tight frame, Pemberton surfaces doubly elated as the telescope zooms out to unveil Clara and Oscar in their pajamas. Clara shrugs, and she and Oscar exchange nods before Pemberton pivots and floats away. Clara and Oscar prance down the corridor toward their nests. Before dropping the tablet, Oscar ponders on Gina's riddles, then glances above him, hums quietly, drops the tablet, and skips for Clara's gate. Clara slips back into her cloak and hops to the joining gateway, unhinges the latch, and opens it for Oscar to slide in. He drags a sack to the hammock, spills out the treasures, and begins sorting the trinkets one by one, lifting one out of a pouch before affixing his monocle to inspect it. He hands her the monocle, and she peers through it.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Everyone at the bench crouches together at the fence observing. A woman stands on her heels and nudges a man gently; he only glares at her. She nudges him again, and he reacts a little more warmly. As she attempts to nudge him once more, he halts her. The man places down the book, swings his arms out of bed, tosses his socks, and reaches for his hat simultaneously. He ambles sleepily to the window as Gideon departs his closet and goes to the staircase. The hut is there; he pulls the handle, steps in, latches the swinging door, and taps a lever. The hut begins to rise, but Gideon starts coughing. Suddenly, the staircase halts between levels and the lamps go out, then just as suddenly, the lamps come back on and the staircase resumes ascending. Gideon shakes his head and leans forward, humming again until the hut arrives at his level and proceeds beyond it, leaving him bewildered. The night janitor, dozing behind the counter, does not notice as the staircase proceeds past the entrance level toward the roof and out of sight. Tranquility follows as the engine ceases, then a series of coughs ends with a chilling howl. Rudely startled, the night janitor races to the staircase shaft as his shoes clunk. He peers up, sees nothing, then peers down, taps the signal button, and the engine ignites. An instant later, the hut appears and halts; the night janitor unlatches the barrier, slides back the door, and the camera zooms past him to capture Gideon. Gideon's figure slouches on the floor of the hut in a bizarre, tangled pose resembling a doll with its strings cut, except Gideon has no strings to cut—only a shirt torn from seam to seam. In a close frame, Grandpierre appears doubly astounded as the camera zooms out to reveal Reggie and Adam in their pajamas. Reggie shrugs, and she and Adam exchange glances before Grandpierre turns and departs. Reggie and Adam stroll down the corridor toward their closets. Before placing down, Adam ponders Tex's phrases, then glances behind him, grins softly, places down the book, and marches for Reggie's closet. Reggie slips back into her sweater and wanders to the adjoining door, undoes the clasp, and opens it for Adam to enter. He takes a basket to the sofa, spills out the contents, and begins inspecting the items one by one, pulling one from a pouch before donning his glasses to view it. He hands her the glasses, and she peers through them.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Each person in the forest sits separately on the boulder observing. A pigeon crouches on branches and pecks a squirrel tenderly; it only blinks at her. She pecks him again, and he huffs a little louder. As she prepares to peck him again, he dodges her. The squirrel throws down the newspaper, slides his paws off the hammock, buries his sandals, and searches for his jacket at the same moment. He tiptoes swiftly to the window as Oscar escapes his closet and heads to the staircase. The basket is there; he lifts the curtain, climbs, fastens the curtain rod, and flips a switch. The basket floats up, but Oscar starts giggling. Abruptly, the staircase halts between landings and the fans go on, then just as abruptly, the fans switch off and the staircase resumes drifting upwards. Oscar taps his knee and leans forward, humming again until the basket reaches his ceiling and floats past it, leaving him bewildered. The morning chef, snoring beneath the stove, does not observe as the staircase wanders past the rooftop level toward the clouds and out of view. Noise follows as the gears begin, then a string of giggles concludes with a joyful laugh. Sleepily disturbed, the morning chef skips to the staircase banister as her mittens clap. She glances down, hears nothing, then glances up, switches the light switch, and the gears halt. An eternity later, the basket appears and floats; the morning chef closes the latch, pushes open the curtain, and the telescope zooms past her to catch Oscar. Oscar's hat lies on the ceiling of the basket in a peculiar, tangled array resembling a marionette with its cords snipped, except Oscar holds no cords to snip—only a scarf unwrapped from neck to wrist. In an open frame, McDuck arises doubly calm as the telescope snaps back to uncover Carla and Bob in their pajamas. Carla frowns, and she and Bob exchange glances before McDuck sighs and vanishes. Carla and Bob float across the ceiling toward their closets. Before wrapping up, Bob doubts Murray's ideas, then glances ahead, grins loudly, wraps up the scarf, and dances for Carla's closet. Carla jumps off into her pajamas and heads to the linked curtain, ties the knot, and pushes it for Bob to peek. He brings a box to the hammock, twirls out the shadows, and ends flipping the memories one by one, taking one out of a shoe before snapping on his monocle to stare at it. He passes her the monocle, and she gazes beneath them.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The group stands at the rail, watching as a woman stands on tip-toes to kiss a man. He responds reluctantly at first but warms slightly on the second kiss. Elsewhere, Gideon hangs up a call, slips into his robe, and takes an elevator, which suddenly stops and goes dark. When it resumes, Gideon is puzzled as it bypasses his floor, descending to the basement, causing a startled night porter to intervene. The elevator returns, revealing Gideon's lifeless body sprawled grotesquely, throat cut. Grandpierre arrives, visibly distressed, joined by Reggie and Adam in bathrobes. As Grandpierre departs, Adam reflects on Tex's words before entering Reggie's room, examining items from a bag. He hands Reggie glasses to inspect the contents.

Adam start down the hall toward their rooms Before hanging up Adam reflects on Tex's words then looks behind him smiles softly hangs up the phone and heads for Reggie's door Reggie slips back into her robe and goes to the connecting door undo es the bolt and opens it for Adam to enter He takes a bag to the bed dumps out the contents and begins examining the items one by one taking one out of an envelope before putting on his glasses to read it He hands her the glasses and she looks through them Everyone at the table stands together at the rail watching A woman rises on tiptoes and kisses a man gently he only looks at her She kisses him again and he responds a little better As she starts to kiss him again he stops her The man hangs up the phone swings his feet out of bed spears his slippers and reaches for his robe at the same time He shuffles sleepily to the door as Gideon exits his room and goes to the elevator The cage is there he opens the door enters closes the sliding grill and presses a button The cage starts down but Gideon begins sneezing Suddenly the elevator stops between floors and the lights go out then just as suddenly the lights come back on and the elevator resumes moving down Gideon shakes his head and leans back whistling again until the cage comes to his floor and starts past it leaving him confused The night porter asleep behind the desk does not notice as the elevator continues past the lobby level toward the basement and out of sight Silence follows as the motor stops
